name: Flappy Bounce
description:
This is a submission for Vimlarks VimJam 3.0! The theme was "multi-use" and the added theme was "turn up the heat". Your left click has multiple uses (the only button needed to play. Use it to flap through tubes and kill enemies. The fun is balancing when to kill enemies to still make it within the tubes!) and the cube overheats if you flap too much, meaning you need to land on the floor or ceiling to rest for a second (otherwise, you will lose control and fall).

How to Play:

-Click red things (other than the tubes) to kill them

-Flap through tubes to gain points (you may also collect points after purchasing the points power-up).

-Use these points to change your character, get the opportunity for additional points (with the points power-up), and to win the game!

Assets from syntystudios, hutonggames, sidearmstudios, and muzstationproduction
